title: Hands On with Victor Technology DC350
description:
http://www.touchboards.com/victor-technology-dc350/

The Victor Technology DC350 dual monitor sit-stand desk converter transforms any sit down desk into a sitting or standing desk. The DC350 dual monitor desk converter is a simple solution to a common workplace problem: too much sitting. Studies show that sitting for prolonged periods of time is detrimental to your health. Sleek wood construction and a durable laminate coating provide years of use with a modern style. The 28" wide by 23" deep surface is raised up to 15.5" for ergonomic placement of laptop computer, keyboard, mouse, or papers while standing.
